Reviews.Content: stayed doubletree mission valley spring break regardless negative reviews listed incredible time staff awesome helpful mark manager particular extremely accomodating maid service wonderful sales lady debbie gift shop size beds pillows die mini balcony overlooked pool palm trees beautiful noise freeway trolley wasnt loud little hummm indoor pool warm bathtub exaggeration didnt outdoor cool looked nice hot tub hot soothing grounds kept beautiful firepits nights relaxing day breakfast buffet additional price reasonable delicious service dining excellent safe parking street amost walk fast food grocery stores negative fridge didnt days left wasnt charged enjoyed stay clean am picky found air conditioning requests extra towels care free internet print boarding passes plus fitness centre walking day zoo treadmill recommend hotel definitely stay lovely san diego ps la jolla coming quick 20 min drive coast

Reviews.Title: “Beware of Hidden Fees! They lurk everywhere at this hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: mawokc
Reviews.Content: disgusted hotel booked reservations online offering 60 night arrived doubletree learned charge 14day park horrible arrive pay park towed learned wifi 12day 86 include price vacation paid arrived didnt worry petty breakfast 1619 person nice advance fees stayed pathetic excuse air conditioning unit wall cooled lights changed drains slow staff front desk rude hello didnt bother thank staying checked wouldnt reccomend worst enemy worst hotel stayed
